website_summaries.verdict: A well-built, easy to maintain safety razor, but its short handle and resulting shift in balance isn’t for everybody.
pros: Well balanced, with a short handle, giving a close shave for most beards
Knurled handle improves grip in wet shaving conditions
Easy blade change with butterfly open and close mechanism
cons: Razor isn't correctly balanced, requiring users to press harder when shaving
Short handle is difficult for some to use, especially for shaving legs
Skin irritation is a frequent problem

customer_reviews.title: A Definite Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't own any product that is as high quality as this one. I originally looked into this razor as a way to cut down on plastic waste production, but was surprised by how lovely this razor is! It is rare to find goods truly made to last these days. The design makes it easy to change blades. I did not have any trouble shaving my legs and I am used to using Venus razors. I plan on converting my friends and family to this masterpiece of a grooming tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting to slice myself up, I won't lie. When I put the blade to my cheek, and raked downward, it was very smooth. I was surprised, and elated. I don't use shaving cream, only warm water, and this blade facilitated that ability very well. I thought lather would be needed, but I made no changes in my routine, and I'm gonna save a lot of money. Plus it looks nice, and feels better. Can't lose.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice little kit, and priced appropriately. I had never used this type of shaving "method" before, so I thought that I would give it a try. There definitely is a learning curve to shaving with this thing, as I inadvertently sliced my face a few times. I have since watched a few YouTube videos to learn the tricks or "do's & don'ts" shaving with this method, and have drastically reduced the many "oops-ies". I am not entirely sold on this being a great way to shave for myself, but I'll give it a few more attempts. For the amount spent, this was surely a reasonable gamble to try.
customer_reviews.author: Hojohowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great razor; highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This razor is AMAZING. I bought this because I needed a way to safely travel with a double edge razor and this one came with a case. It feels substantial and has a nice weight to it. I get much less irritation and cuts (provided I don't rush) when using this razor. I actually use this double edge razor to shave my head but a cartridge razor for my face. I get less irritation with the cartridge style on my face but I get the best results when shaving my head with the double edge razor. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality razor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My dad got me interested in safety razors after he let me use his with a new blade to shave my legs. I'm never going back to cartridges again! This is so much more cost efficient and I have a smoother, longer lasting shave than using the cartridges. I love that this razor comes with a stand, storage case with a mirror, and five double edge blades. The handle is easy to grip and has a nice weight that's not to heavy or too light. I highly recommend this for men and women who are just getting into safety razors. With everthing that you get, it's a good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It's really not that bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's really not that bad for the price. I also shave with the Merkur HD 34C and while I prefer that razor this is still not bad. I get almost the same sort of shave, although I think the Merkur feels studier and like it will last longer than this one. Changing blades is very simple. I am prone to a bit more cuts and nicks with this than the Merkur, but I'm not disappointed in the purchase. It's under my sink as a backup blade or maybe to travel with. If you can afford a better razor I recommend Merkur, but this isn't bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wright

customer_reviews.title: A close shave without lots of irritation
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it has that nostalgic LOOK. Memories of watching my dad use a double edge razor similar to this one. For me I have realized over the years that regardless of the number of blades on any particular razor, I still end up with irritation that results in razor bumps. After a week of using this one, and having total control over how I angle the blade and the amount of pressure used have resulted in a smoother shave, less burning, fewer razor bumps. Over time I will learn if overall, this razor is the best choice for me. I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steele

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no rust
customer_reviews.text: 2 years later and this razor is still the only one I use for shaving. No rust whatsoever and the screw mechanism still feels new. I bought this because I grow my facial hair out a good amount before shaving and all that hair gets stuck in multi-layer razors. With this I can shave whenever I want regardless of how long my hair has gotten. Make sure to use fresh razors though after ~5 uses because it makes all the difference. Multiple friends of mine now use this as well and like it too

It provided a great shaving experience and I am bummed that it took me this long to give it a try. This razor is a great value and the perfect way to dip your toe into the safety razor world.

I am buying several as gifts for other family members. 5 Star all the way.

Try screwing off the top of a shaving kit with your hands and it will scare the hell out of you. Even using a towel to try to unscrew it scared me. I thought I would get the worse paper cut imaginable. This razor has fixed that. It unscrews at the bottom and the top opens like a beautiful set of butterfly wings. I love this razor and will keep buying more.
